```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

```{r setup}
library(bhmbasket.predict)
library(survival)
library(dplyr)

tbl_data <- readr::read_delim(
  "inst/example_data2.csv", 
  delim = ";", 
  col_types = readr::cols(
    id = readr::col_integer(), 
    t1 = readr::col_double(), 
    t2 = readr::col_double()
  )
)
```

```{r simulate-data}
model <- this_function_needs_a_good_name(
  0, 0.05,
  2, .1,
  3, 1
)
tbl_smpl <- draw_samples(model, 0L, data = tbl_data, nsim = 10L)
```

```{r}
tbl_smpl %>% 
  survfit(Surv(t, is.finite(t)) ~ iter, data = .) %>% 
  plot
```
